member.name: T:ProgressBars.src.Count
member.summary: Indicates doing proccess by index like this. Done 4/17

member.name: P:ProgressBars.src.Count.Keyword
member.summary: Set word that would indicate kind of process. If keyword equals "Installing": Installing 3/21

member.param: Set word that would indicate kind of process. If keyword equals "Installing": Installing 3/21

member.name: M:ProgressBars.src.Count.Report(System.Int32)
member.summary: Report of changing value of progress

member.name: M:ProgressBars.src.Count.SetCompleted(System.String)
member.summary: Set completed string like this. Completed
member.param: Set key word that will appear when proccess end.

member.name: T:ProgressBars.ProgressBar
member.summary: Indicates doing process by line like this [####------]

member.name: M:ProgressBars.ProgressBar.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: If true progress will be write percent like this. Done 20% [##------]
If true progress will be write animation like this. Done 20% [##------] // Done 30% [##------] ==

member.name: M:ProgressBars.ProgressBar.Report(System.Int32)
member.summary: Report of changing value of progress

member.name: T:ProgressBars.Status
member.summary: Indicates doing process by name like this. Installing Image.img...

member.name: P:ProgressBars.Status.Keyword
member.summary: Set word that would indicate kind of process. If keyword equals "Installing": Installing MyApp.exe...

member.name: M:ProgressBars.Status.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: Set word that would indicate kind of process. If keyword equals "Installing": Installing MyApp.exe...
If true progress will be write animation like this. Installing Image.img. Installing Image.img.. Installing Image.img...

member.name: M:ProgressBars.Status.Report(System.String)
member.summary: Report of changing value of progress
